const boxVariants={initial:{opacity:0,scale:0},visible:{opacity:1,scale:1},leaving:{opacity:0,scale:0}};export default function LoginBox(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({id:'',password:''});const[userId,setUserId]=useState('');const[isLocationSaved,setIsLocationSaved]=useState(false);const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);// 로그인 상태 추가
